```{r valencia}
val_list = read.csv("valencia_listings.csv", sep=',')
val_rev = read.csv("valencia_reviews.csv", sep=',')
head(val_list, 3)

```

```{r merge}
library(dplyr)
colnames(val_list)[colnames(val_list) == "id"] <- "listing_id"
head(val_list, 3)
unido = merge(val_list, val_rev, by = "listing_id", all.x = TRUE)
head(merged, 3)
```
